data.title: Players Added and Removed in NBA 2K21
meta_keywords: Players Added and Removed in NBA 2K21
data.meta_description: Players removed from NBA 2K21 - Darren Collison - Tyreke Evans - Shaun Livingston - Jeremy Lin - Lance Stephenson - Zaza Pachulia - Devin Harris -
data.text:
MVP

OVR: 10

Join Date: Jan 2005

Location: GA

Players Added and Removed in NBA 2K21

Players removed from NBA 2K21

- Darren Collison

- Tyreke Evans

- Shaun Livingston

- Jeremy Lin

- Lance Stephenson

- Zaza Pachulia

- Devin Harris

- Luol Deng

- Andrew Bogut

- Nick Young

- Raymond Felton

- Jose Calderon

- Channing Frye

- Timofey Mozgov

- Nick Collison

- Omer Asik

- Jerryd Bayless

- Dante Cunningham

- Jon Leuer

- Quincy Pondexter

- Ian Clark

- Wes Unseld

- Jerry Sloan

Players Added To NBA2K21:

- Kirk Hinrich - All Time Bulls

- Lamar Odom - All Time Clippers

- Manu Ginóbili - All Time Spurs, 04-05 Spurs & 13-14 Spurs

- Luis Scola - 07-08 Rockets, 1314 Pacers

- Rafer Alston - 07-08 Rockets

- Landry Fields - 11-12 Knicks

All Time Team Additions:

Khris Middleton - Milwaukee Bucks

Reggie Theus & Kirk Hinrich - Chicago Bulls

Lamar Odom & Kawhi Leonard - LA Clippers

Ja Morant & Jaren Jackson Jr - Memphis Grizzlies

Trae Young - Atlanta Hawks

Bam Adebayo - Miami Heat

DeAaRon Fox - Sacramento Kings

Lebron James - LA Lakers

Domantas Sabonis - Indiana Pacers

Brandon Ingram - New Orleans Pelicans

So far thats what Ive found via small amount of leaked footage Ive seen.

I will update with a complete list including players removed once I get my hands on the game and the day 1 patch & roster is released.

Thanking the basketball Gods that they've finally allowed Manu back into 2K. Playing with the classic Spurs teams was hard without the 6th man to wreck havoc, but now, both of those classic squads are going to be back in the rotation for PNO.
